title: Fireborne
author: Rosaria Munda
summary: Dragon riders, politics, and complicated bonds in a post-revolution world.

title: The Bridge Kingdom
author: Danielle L. Jensen
summary: Assassin princess marries enemy king for espionage; feelings complicate the mission.

title: The Way of Kings
author: Brandon Sanderson
summary: Storm-battered world with intertwined fates, deep magic, and grand war.

title: The Ballad of Black Tom
author: Victor LaValle
summary: Jazz musician entangled with eldritch forces in 1920s Harlem.
